meanings.definition: The state or quality of being floriferous.
meanings.sent1: The floriferousness of the garden brought joy to all.
meanings.sent2: Her floriferousness was evident in the beautiful bouquet she arranged.
meanings.sent3: The floriferousness of the flower shop made it a popular spot for visitors.
meanings.sent4: The floriferousness of her creativity bloomed in every painting she created.
meanings.sent5: The floriferousness of the meadow was a sight to behold, a sea of colorful blooms.

meanings.definition: The ability to produce flowers abundantly.
meanings.sent1: The floriferousness of the rose bush amazed the gardener.
meanings.sent2: In spring, the floriferousness of the cherry trees is a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent3: The floriferousness of the daisy plant seemed almost magical.
meanings.sent4: Her garden's floriferousness was like a symphony of petals dancing in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The floriferousness of the sunflowers turned the field into a golden sea of blooms.
